title: Câmbio
heading:
The Curitiba
Bus Token
subHeading: A Celo founding myth about Innovating on Money
introduction:
cLabs is shaping foundational technology to build a financial system that creates the conditions for prosperity—for everyone. This technology is called Celo.

In doing purposeful, challenging work, having a shared vision through the process is important to cLabs. We convey that vision through telling stories where technology and forms of value were not just fair and functional but inspiring.

Important stories reflect lessons and morals to the work we do in face of growth and adversity. On of these stories that continues to guide us is the story of Curitiba’s Bus Token.
